faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about Expense Splitter.

items.a: Expense Splitter helps you share costs with friends, family, or teams. Create groups, add expenses, and see who owes what.

items.q: How do I add an expense?
items.a: Go to Expenses and click 'Add Expense'. Fill in the title, amount, payer, and participants. Choose a split method (equal or custom).
By default, amounts are split equally among selected participants. You can choose custom splits by entering specific amounts for each person.
You can record expenses in your preferred currency. Amounts are displayed using local formatting for clarity.

items.q: Can I edit or delete an expense?
items.a: Yes. Open an expense detail, then use the Edit or Delete actions in the header.
Settlements help track reimbursements. Record a payment between members to reduce outstanding balances.

items.q: How do I share an expense?
items.a: Open the expense and click 'Share'. A receipt-style summary is copied to your clipboard for easy sharing.
Yes. Use the theme toggle in the header to switch between light and dark themes.
